 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאָה‎</span>] **verb** ==make a din or crash, crash into ruins== (perhaps akin to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺאָה‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוא‎</span>) ***storm, devastation***; &gt;Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be deserted, ***<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁהֲוָוא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁהֲוָתָא‎</span> ***desert***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאוּ‎</span> [[Isa.6.11|Isa 6:11]] until cities ***have crashed into ruins***; + perhaps [[Nah.1.5|Nah 1:5]] (p. 671a). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשָּׁאֶה שְׁמָמָה‎</span> [[Isa.6.11|Isa 6:11]], usually, and the ground ***be ruined*** into a desolation, but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשָּׁאֵר‎</span> ***be left*** a desolation; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁא֑וּן‎</span> [[Isa.17.12|Isa 17:12]] ***they are in uproar*** (of nations, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶהֱמָיוּן‎</span>), v[[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] (but strike out as doublet [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַשְׁאוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.37.26|Isa 37:26]], = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַהְשׁוֺת‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.25|2Kgs 19:25]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:23f»§ 23f</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 570</sup>, who follow [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] in giving <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַשְׁאוֺת‎</span> as [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], but see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]]), ***to cause*** ... cities ***to crash*** into ruined heaps.
